summary.span: 命名空间提供了对等网络功能的访问权。

span.span: The namespace provides access to peer networking functionality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对等方如何发现彼此并解析标识符是很复杂的瞬态连接以及缺少地址记录如域名系统 (DNS) 的访问的权限。How peers discover each other and resolve identifiers is complicated by transient connectivity and the lack of access to address records such as the Domain Name System (DNS). Windows 对等基础结构可解决此问题与名为 PNRP 名称解析和对等发现方案。The Windows Peer-to-Peer Infrastructure solves this problem with a name resolution and peer discovery scheme called PNRP. 对等名称解析协议 (PNRP) 提供对等网络的名称解析的机制。Peer Name Resolution Protocol (PNRP) provides a name resolution mechanism for peer-to-peer networks. PNRP 旨在将名称解析为一个网络完全对等的方式。PNRP is designed to resolve a name to a network in a completely peer-to-peer manner. 中提供了基本的 PNRP 功能命名空间类。Basic PNRP functionality is provided in the namespace classes. 它们可提供功能创建对等方并将其在注册的对等方。They provide the ability to create a peer and register it in a of peers. 它们还提供了解决功能到其网络终结点、 TCP 端口、 云或其他地址标识符。They also provide the ability to resolve a to its network endpoint, TCP port, cloud, or other address identifier(s). 中提供的对等网络的高级的功能命名空间。Advanced functionality for peer-to-peer networking is provided in the namespace. 在 Windows Vista 中，PNRP 作为一项服务，由应用程序启动按需提供。In Windows Vista, PNRP ships as a service that is started on demand by applications. 此外，还有 PNRP 机器注册服务，可以手动启用应用程序或用户如果用户想要发布的远程连接或通信的计算机名称。In addition, there is a PNRP machine registration service that can be manually enabled by applications or users if they want to publish machine names for remote connections and communications. PNRP 版本 1 已包含在 Windows XP Service Pack 2 (SP2)、 Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 和 Windows XP Service Pack 1 (SP1) 以及高级网络包适用于 Windows XP 的。PNRP version 1 was included in Windows XP Service Pack 2 (SP2), Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, and Windows XP with Service Pack 1 (SP1) and the Advanced Networking Pack for Windows XP. 此外，还有 PNRP 计算机注册服务，可以手动启用应用程序/用户如果发布的计算机名称，以进行远程连接和通信的兴趣。In addition, there is a PNRP machine registration service which can be manually enabled by applications/users if there is interest in publishing machine names for remote connection and communication.
